mapper.select: select GROUP_ID,TMP_CONTENT from ( (SELECT UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_GROUP.group_id, UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_GROUP.sms_template_code FROM UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_GROUP where UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID=#{headId}::int4 AND UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_TYPE=#{activityType}) t1 join UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE on t1.SMS_TEMPLATE_CODE =UO_qywx_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE.TMP_CODE) t2

select count(1) from UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL,UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP,UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN where UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID=UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID= UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_TYPE AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = #{planId}

select to_char(UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PUSH_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') PUSH_DATE_STR, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PUSH_STATUS, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.EPB_PRODUCT_NAME, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.EPB_PRODUCT_ID, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.USER_ID, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.SMS_CONTENT, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.ORDER_PERIOD, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_NAME, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.ACTIVITY_PROFIT, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.ACTIVITY_PRICE, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.QYWX_DETAIL_ID, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.MP_TITLE, UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.MP_URL from UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL,UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN,UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP where UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.HEAD_ID=UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.HEAD_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID= UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.GROUP_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_GROUP.ACTIVITY_TYPE AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID = UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN.PLAN_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID =#{planId} ORDER BY UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.GROUP_ID ASC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL SET SMS_CONTENT=TMP.TEXT_CONTENT,QYWX_MSG_SIGN=TMP.QYWX_MSG_SIGN,MP_MEDIA_ID=TMP.MP_MEDIA_ID FROM UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_CONTENT_TMP AS TMP WHERE UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.QYWX_DETAIL_ID=TMP.QYWX_DETAIL_ID AND UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL.PLAN_ID=#{planId}::int4
update UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_PLAN set PLAN_STATUS = #{status},VERSION=VERSION+1 where PLAN_ID = #{planId}::int4 AND VERSION=#{version}::int4
mapper.select: select distinct qywx_msg_sign from UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where head_id=#{headId} and follow_user_id=#{followUserId}
select count(*) from UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where head_id = #{headId} and follow_user_id=#{followUserId} and qywx_msg_sign=#{qywxMsgSign}
select * from UO_QYWX_ACTIVITY_DETAIL where head_id = #{headId} and follow_user_id=#{followUserId} and qywx_msg_sign=#{qywxMsgSign} order by qywx_detail_id asc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into uo_qywx_push_list( text_content, push_status, source_code, source_id, follow_user_id, insert_dt, mp_media_id, mp_appid, mp_title, mp_url, external_contact_ids) values(#{textContent}, 'P', 'ACTIVITY', #{sourceId}, #{followUserId}, now(), #{mpMediaId}, #{mpAppid}, #{mpTitle}, #{mpUrl}, #{externalContactIds})
mapper.update: update uo_qywx_push_list set push_status = #{status}, msgid = #{msgId}, push_date = now(), fail_list = #{faildList}, remark=#{remark} where push_id=#{pushId}
mapper.select: select follow_user_id,coalesce(name,'未知') follow_user_name from (select distinct follow_user_id from uo_qywx_activity_detail where plan_id=#{planId} and push_status='X') t1 left join uo_qywx_follower_user_list on t1.follow_user_id=uo_qywx_follower_user_list.user_id order by follow_user_id asc
select distinct EPB_PRODUCT_ID from uo_qywx_activity_detail where plan_id=#{planId}
